short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A plugin to keep you up-to-date with cybersecurity trends, news, mindset and most important awareness.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Perception Chrome Extension by RiDiscovery
Cyber Security is a mindset and we will help you build it.
Every time you open a new tab, Perception by RiDiscovery delivers a power-packed quote to build a secure mindset in this digital era.
This will help you to build a strong perception of cyber security.
FEATURES:
- New tab, new quote, better work
- Smooth, no-clutter interface
- Adaptive to varying screen sizes
- Impactful quotes around cyber security, hacking news, etc.
Quotes sourced from across the RiDiscovery, Certbar team & community. Learn more about the features and updates on Perception by RiDiscovery for Chrome at https://perception.ridiscovery.com
